article: Ann is  an  English girl. She is fourteen. She is a  middle school  student. Her teacher is Miss White. Ann helps her teacher to put  _  books and ruler on the desk. They have a new  _  . In it you can  see  40 desks and chairs. A blackboard, a clock and a map are on the  _  . There are some pens on the desks. The red  _  is Ann's. Others are Kate's. Kate is Ann's  _  friend. Kate isn't    here today . She is ill . Look at the clock.  It's  four o'clock. It's time to go home.
